unnormalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gains Momentum in Maharashtra**
normalised: **smart meter rollout gains momentum in maharashtra**

unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26, 2023 – The Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Limited (MSEDCL) is accelerating its smart meter deployment across the state. Aimed at reducing AT&C losses and improving billing accuracy, the initiative targets replacing conventional meters with smart meters in urban and rural areas.
normalised: mumbai, october twenty six, two thousand and twenty three – the maharashtra state electricity distribution company limited (m s e d c l) is accelerating its smart meter deployment across the state. aimed at reducing A T and C losses and improving billing accuracy, the initiative targets replacing conventional meters with smart meters in urban and rural areas.

unnormalised: Phase 1, initiated on 15/08/2023, focused on high-loss pockets in Nagpur and Pune, seeing approximately 50,000 installations. Officials project a statewide rollout reaching 2.5 crore households by 2025.
normalised: phase one, initiated on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three, focused on high-loss pockets in nagpur and pune, seeing approximately fifty thousand installations. officials project a statewide rollout reaching two point five crore households by two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: "This is a crucial step towards modernizing our energy infrastructure," stated Energy Minister Devendra Fadnavis at a press conference at 11:00 hrs today. "The smart meters will empower consumers with real-time data, enabling better energy management and cost savings. We anticipate a significant reduction in power theft and improved revenue collection for MSEDCL."
normalised: "this is a crucial step towards modernizing our energy infrastructure," stated energy minister devendra fadnavis at a press conference at eleven o'clock hours today. "the smart meters will empower consumers with real-time data, enabling better energy management and cost savings. we anticipate a significant reduction in power theft and improved revenue collection for m s e d c l."

unnormalised: Concerns regarding data privacy and meter tampering are being addressed through robust security protocols and consumer awareness campaigns. A helpline (1912) has been established to address consumer queries. MSEDCL aims for complete phase-1 installation by 30/11/2023 and will hold a consumer awareness camp at 14:00 hrs on 01/11/2023 at Shivaji Park.
normalised: concerns regarding data privacy and meter tampering are being addressed through robust security protocols and consumer awareness campaigns. a helpline (one nine one two) has been established to address consumer queries. m s e d c l aims for complete phase-one installation by thirtieth november two thousand and twenty three and will hold a consumer awareness camp at fourteen o'clock hours on first november two thousand and twenty three at shivaji park.
